responses: You're stronger than you think, and you can handle more than you imagine.
It's really tough to feel that way, but I believe in you. You are enough, just as you are.
When things get hard, it's okay to take a step back. Remember, progress isn't always linear.
Every step you take is progress, even the small ones count. Don’t be too hard on yourself.
You've overcome challenges before, and I believe you can do it again.
It's okay to feel this way. What's important is that you're still here, still trying.
Feeling overwhelmed is a sign you're pushing your limits, and that's where growth happens.
It's brave to continue when things are tough. Your efforts do matter, even if it doesn't seem like it right now.
Believing in yourself is hard, but remember, it's okay to have those moments. You're more capable than you realize.
Take a moment to reflect on how far you've come. It's okay to rest, just don't give up.
Your feelings are valid. Take it one day at a time, one step at a time.
Life's challenges are not a reflection of your worth. You're doing the best you can, and that's enough.
Sometimes the hardest battles lead to the greatest victories. Keep fighting; I'm here cheering you on.
